data.enText: an act of making sth less or smaller; the state of being made less or smaller
a 33% reduction in the number of hospital beds available
There has been some reduction in unemployment.

data.chText: 成本的略微 / 显著 / 大幅度 / 急剧降低

data.enText: an amount of money by which sth is made cheaper

data.chText: 孩子和两个大人合住一间房可以打折。
data.enText: There are reductions for children sharing a room with two adults.

data.chText: （照片、地图、图片等的）缩图，缩版
data.enText: a copy of a photograph, map, picture, etc. that is made smaller than the original one
the fact of adding one or more electrons to a substance or of removing oxygen from a substance

means: (照片、地图、图片等的)缩图，缩版

tr: the act of decreasing or reducing something
any process in which electrons are added to an atom or ion (as by removing oxygen or adding hydrogen)
always occurs accompanied by oxidation of the reducing agent

value.def: When there is a reduction in something, it is made smaller.

example.ex: ...a future reduction in UK interest rates...
Many companies have announced dramatic reductions in staff.
example.tran: 许多公司已经宣布大幅裁员。

value.def: Reduction is the act of making something smaller in size or amount, or less in degree.

example.tran: 新的战略武器削减协议

trans: 还原法；减免法；方法；降阶法；还原方法
减速比；破碎比；压缩比；缩率；缩小比例
减率；压下率；下降率；减速比；削减率
切开复位；开放性复位；切开复位术；手术治疗；开放复位
还原反应；第七章还原反应
数据整理（简化）；缩写词为DRON
化学还原法；化学还原；还原型
